text: Tren de Aragua (English: Aragua Train) is a large gang from Venezuela. There may be more than 5,000 people in the gang. The gang has moved into different nations in Latin America and into the United States. Stopping the gang has become very important to nations where Tren de Aragua has gone. This is because the gang makes serious crimes. Because of this, the United States named the gang a Foreign Terrorist Organization. == References == Category:CS1 European Spanish-language sources (es-es) Category:Gangs Category:Venezuela Category:Crime in South America Category:Crime in North America
title: Tren de Aragua
